Inline Angle bracket components
.
<MyComponent/>
.
<MyComponent/>
.

Inline Angle bracket components with space
.
<MyComponent />
.
<MyComponent />
.

Inline Angle bracket components with args
.
<MyComponent @foo="yes" 
@bar="no" />
.
<MyComponent @foo="yes" 
@bar="no" />
.


Angle bracket components
.
<MyComponent></MyComponent>
.
<MyComponent></MyComponent>
.

Angle bracket components with arguments
.
<MyComponent @param={{foo}}></MyComponent>
.
<MyComponent @param={{foo}}></MyComponent>
.

Angle bracket components with arguments and block
.
<MyComponent @param={{foo}}>
  hello world
</MyComponent>
.
<MyComponent @param={{foo}}>
  hello world
</MyComponent>
.

Angle bracket components with arguments, block and yield
.
<MyComponent @param={{foo}} as |my|>
  <my.Foo>Hello</my.Foo>

  <my.Bar>World</my.Bar>
</MyComponent>
.
<MyComponent @param={{foo}} as |my|>
  <my.Foo>Hello</my.Foo>

  <my.Bar>World</my.Bar>
</MyComponent>
.

curly braces
.
{{#my-component}}{{/my-component}}
.
{{#my-component}}{{/my-component}}
-
